release.action: Added methods to provide pre-quoted arguments.
Exposing a ExecuteWatchdog.destroy() to kill an asynchrounous process manually. This formalizes a workaround described in the JIRA
Extending exit value handling to support applications returning an error code.
Cleaned up the source code to get rid of javadoc errors and unused imports.
Added a few regression tests for the watchdog since they were missing.
